programme.desc: Tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.Saksilan lakonan mantap Lisa Surihani , dan kumpulan senario

programme.title: Gema Lawak Superstar Ep02
programme.desc: Bertemakan 'Spoof-Sama Tak Serupa', kumpulan manakah yang bakal dinobatkan sebagai juara mingguan pada minggu kedua ini?

programme.title: JOZAN Ep12
programme.desc: Duo pelawak paling popular kini kembali setelah 7 tahun tidak bersama menghiburkan peminat menerusi program bual bicara terbaru yang pasti menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2017 Ep04
programme.desc: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2017 menampilkan peserta solo dan berkumpulan dari tiga negara berentap merebut gelaran juara dan hadiah wang tunai.

programme.title: Tanya Sama Pokok Ep12
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehidupan di sebuah kampung moden yang sudah semakin terdedah dengan kemodenan tetapi dalam waktu yang sama masih mengekalkan ciri-ciri hidup berkampung.

programme.title: Tiga Serumah S2 Ep04
programme.desc: Drama komedi musim ke-2 tentang sepasang suami isteri, Ramlie dan Susan yang baru berkahwin dan tinggal di sebuah rumah di Kuala Lumpur bersama bapa Susan.

programme.title: Kuali Terbalik Ep11
programme.desc: Sebuah program baru yang menggabungkan elemen drama, komedi dan program masakan dalam satu rancangan. Setiap episod akan menampilakan spoof daripada drama terbaik Astro dan juga filem box office.

programme.title: Padan Muka! Ep11
programme.desc: Pelawak & selebriti popular perlu menjawab soalan sambil diganggu untuk alih perhatian mereka daripada memberi jawapan betul. Jika gagal, mereka didenda dan reaksi diberi adalah paling ditunggu-tunggu.

programme.title: Chapalrela Ep10
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Anjang Merah yang sering dibuli oleh saudara dan mak tirinya lakonan mantap Zizan, Johan dan Sherry Ibrahim.

programme.title: Selera Rasa Seksa Ep11
programme.desc: Saksikan Datuk Chef Wan dalam sebuah 'game show' masakan komedi yang riuh! Pedas! Panas! Bersama selebriti terkenal tanah air.

programme.title: Di Balik Tawa Ep11
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara menggunakan konsep terbuka atau sesi perkongsian daripada pelawak-pelawak yang akan menceritakan pengalaman dan kisah yang mereka tidak pernah kongsi dengan masyarakat.

programme.title: Kisah Tok Kadi S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Shahrul kecewa apabila mendapat tahu Riyan pergi bersama ke lawatan perniagaan di Jakarta bersama Humairah. Bapa mertua Shahrul tersinggung apabila terdengar pergaduhan antara Shahrul dan Humairah.

programme.title: Layan Je! Opera Zero Ep12
programme.desc: Jom berhibur bersama kumpulan Zero dalam klip-klip yang menarik dan menghiburkan. Saksikan Opera Zero, setiap Khamis jam 9 malam.

programme.title: Layan Je! Ustaz Evo Ep03
programme.desc: Saksikan klip menarik tentang Ustaz Evo yang bakal menghiburkan anda seisi sekeluarga.

programme.title: Layan Je! Gegar Lawak Ep04
programme.desc: Saksikan kompilasi lawak terbaik daripada program Gegar Lawak 2018.

programme.title: Ragam Cucu & Atuk Ep08
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa pendek mengisahkan tentang seorang atuk, yang merupakan bekas askar melayan karenah cucu kesayangannya.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 Ep05
programme.desc: Pertandingan lawak paling popular kini kembali dengan musim terbaru! Bersama hos Dato' AC Mizal, kumpulan manakah yang bakal berjaya membuat para juri & penonton ketawa sehingga bergelar juara?

programme.title: Ngaroot Ep03
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa yang menampilkan finalis MLM 2017 membawakan watak lucu yang bertemakan isu semasa. Selain itu, program ini turut memaparkan nilai murni dan pengajaran yang berguna buat penonton.

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar Ep05
programme.desc: Mokumentari famili Mak Jah bersama anak-anaknya dan keluarga mereka yang terdiri daripada Abang Long, Abang Ngah dan isterinya Kamariah, Azura dan Kamal, Azlan dan Adibah.

programme.title: Super Spontan Superstar S2 Ep06
programme.desc: Saksikan pertarungan hebat antara kumpulan 'Tenggiling Taiko' dan 'King Musang' berentap pada setiap minggu bagi merebut gelaran Juara.

programme.title: Tak Kot Ep10
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular tanah air bercuti sambil dicabar menangani fobia yang terdapat dalam diri mereka. Berjayakah mereka menyelesaikan misi?

programme.title: Muzikal Lawak Superstar 2 Terbaik Ep03
programme.desc: Program istimewa selama satu jam ini menghimpunkan kembali persembahan-persembahan yang paling trending dan menjadi bualan netizen terutamanya daripada finalis dan kumpulan-kumpulan lain.

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik Ep11
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara yang dihoskan Dato' AC Mizal menjemput artis menaiki kereta 'Vintage' dan berbual menceritakan kisah hidup seseorang artis.

programme.title: Pecah Perut Ep11
programme.desc: Sebuah program sketsa komedi yang menampilkan barisan pelawak dan pelakon popular seperti Kamal Adli, Sherry Al-Hadad, Shahrul Shiro, Mamak Puteh dan ramai lagi

programme.title: Konsert Komedi Ep02
programme.desc: Konsert eksklusif hiburan komedi yang menampilkan barisan pelawak terkenal di pentas nyanyian bergabung bersama idola-idola mereka.

programme.title: Klik Riders Ep07
programme.desc: Syarikat mahu mengurangkan komisyen rider. Ijan, Kamal, Yus, dan Tasya tidak berpuas hati. Sementera itu, Kamal mencadangkan agar menubuhkan sebuah persatuan rider.

programme.title: Meja Panggang Ep03
programme.desc: Bersama Dato Rosyam Nor, Didie Alias, Sharifah Shahira & Achey, saksikan mereka 'memanggang' para tetamu dengan soalan-soalan panas tentang kisah lampau dan peribadi mereka.

programme.title: Potong Ep03
programme.desc: Mudim ingin bertemu budak yang dikatakan bentan setelah sunat tetapi dihalang bapanya. Budak tersebut akhirnya mengaku bahaya dia telah melanggar pantang sehingga menyebabkan bentan.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong Sayang (HD) Ep11
programme.desc: Kesinambungan dari program popular 'Betul Ke Bohong' yang menyaksikan pasangan-pasangan bersaing untuk mengelak dari dikenakan kejutan elektrik bersama hos Johan dan Ozlynn

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Emily Chang in San Francisco.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: With Tom Keene, Jonathan Ferro, and Lisa Abramowicz from New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: With Tom Keene, Jonathan Ferro, and Lisa Abramowicz from New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg: the Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
programme.desc: From New York, the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Hansel And Gretel
programme.desc: After meeting an mysterious girl on an dark stretch of road, a young salesman is invited to a beautiful house with bizarre secrets and no way to escape.

programme.title: Malam Satu Suro
programme.desc: A young man marries a woman, not knowing she is a sundel bolong, the spirit of a woman who died during childbirth.

programme.title: Roh
programme.desc: Deep in a forest, a prophecy of death by a strange child unleashes terrifying events on a mother and her two children. Inspired by a Japanese horror classic, this was Malaysia's submission to the Oscars.

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: A woman, whose brother died recently, believes she can communicate with spirits. Soon, she starts getting mysterious text messages.

programme.title: Sis Ngesot
programme.desc: Whilst a band is recording in a studio, the lights go out and from a corner of the room, Sis Ngesot appears, terrifying the musicians.

programme.title: 12:06 Rumah Kucing
programme.desc: Since his daughter brought home some stray cats, Randy and his family experience frightening phenomena in their home at midnight everyday. Things go out of hand, when their daugher is possessed.

programme.title: Kumanthong
programme.desc: Based on true events that happened in Vietnam, a deaf-mute woman marries a psychopathic murderer. She must find a way to expose him and save innocent lives, while finding a way to stay alive.

programme.title: Banglo Berkunci
programme.desc: 3 sahabat suka melakukan aktiviti paranormal di tempat-tempat mistik bagi mencari kepastian sama ada benar hantu itu wujud. Mereka telah pergi ke sebuah banglo yang mempunyai sejarah hitam.

programme.title: Check-in Shock
programme.desc: The film Check-in Shock is the basis for the story of the reality game show, Check-in Shock. With a focus on hate and malice, contestants step into the realm of curses and feuding evil spirits.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: To nab a sales manager who's at large after murdering his family, a detective investigates the man's colleagues, who seem to be hiding something.

programme.title: Memoir
programme.desc: An insurance saleswoman meets an old friend to make a sale. Her friend's house is old and eerie. As she starts to leave, a shadow is following closely behind ...

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Due to his mother's pressure and ill treatment, Zaidi and his wife move to a village mansion belonging to his grandmother where they are haunted by strange dreams and the eerie screams of babies.

programme.title: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati
programme.desc: Sienna's ability to see the sign of when people will die, really frightens her. The more she tries to forget, the more people she knows died, one by one.

programme.title: Psikopat
programme.desc: A ghost who demands the settlement of her unnatural death has become a corpse collected in a bunker with other corpses.

programme.title: Ghost Day
programme.desc: Two exorcists capture their work on video and upload it to YouTube. They come to the attention of a production crew trying to save its TV show from cancellation. They get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Villa Angker Lembang
programme.desc: When an offer seems too good to be true, it probably is. Kemal buys into a haunted resort, and now he must fight for the survival of his family.

programme.title: Roh
programme.desc: Deep in a forest, a prophecy of death by a strange child unleashes terrifying events on a mother and her two children. Inspired by a Japanese horror classic, this was Malaysia's submission to the Oscars.

programme.title: Banglo Berkunci

programme.title: Telaga Angker
programme.desc: A pregnant woman is killed when she drives her car into a lake. But soon her spirit returns to exact revenge on those who had caused her death.

programme.title: Mistik
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar terjebak dalam satu ekspedisi ilusi di Pulau Bayu Biru yang penuh misteri. Lakonan Lisdawati, Farid Kamil, Cico, Ezat Exist, Julia Hana dan ramai lagi.

programme.title: Eight: Fear The Legend
programme.desc: An old man, fated to collect souls for eternity, seeks atonement after trading his daughter's soul.

programme.title: Memoir
programme.desc: An insurance saleswoman meets an old friend to make a sale. Her friend's house is old and eerie. As she starts to leave, a shadow is following closely behind ...

programme.title: Ghost Stories

programme.title: Heaven & Hell

programme.title: The Closed Ward
programme.desc: A group of people are mysteriously trapped in an abandoned hospital, with no clue what fate awaits them.

programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: Flipping a coin' takes on a whole new meaning in this action-packed, martial arts melodrama - because the pocket change is actually deadly kung-fu weapons.

programme.title: Forever and Ever
programme.desc: Huangmei Opera queen, Ivy Ling Po stars in this tale of a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter a girl who is dying.

programme.title: Angel With the Iron Fists
programme.desc: After her father is killed by gangsters, a young woman seeks revenge plus bids to ensure that justice is served. Starring Lily Ho.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This abourer and complex adaptation of a popular wuxia novel contains conspiracies, stratagems, and sword fights aplenty.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, this Huangmei Opera is a heady mix of love, betrayal, murder, and redemption.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A ruthless gang goes up against a millionaire's daughter who has one of three priceless Golden Buddha statues.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Problems ensue after one of two childhood friends who have vowed to become sisters through the exchange of bracelets gets married.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: This Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical depicts a turbulent romance between Yu Lan, a passionate tea picker and a charming fisherman named Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: With a focus on the pampered teenaged Jia Bao Yu, believed to be of supernatural origins, this Chinese classic depicts the Jia family's rise and fall.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: The famed Ivy Ling Po plays a mysterious swordswoman, who teams up with the Roving Knight in a battle against a string of intimidating villains.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: Set in the Han Dynasty, this drama depicts the legendary beauty Diao Chan, and how she used her charms to help her godfather eradicate corrupt court officials.

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: In The Kung-fu Instructor, Ti Lung plays hero Huang Yang, a righteous weapon instructor whose main concern eventually becomes his survival.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a famed Chinese opera, this melodramatic film depicts the romance between Zhang Sheng, an impoverished scholar, and Ying Ying, who is from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: Award-winning director Chang Cheh depicts the struggle of the Shaolin monasteries when the Ching Dynasty sets trap to separate and destroy them.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: In this mind-blowing sequel to the Shaw Brothers' horror hit, zombies run amok, driving doctors to seek a natural cause while the actual one may be supernatural.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: After enduring several trials (including his girlfriend's rape), a man (Chen Wo-Fu) puts his tai chi skills to deadly use.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A jewel thief tries to have a new life as a singer but a series of robberies gets people wondering if he has returned to his old ways.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: The Emperor develops a more deadly Flying Guillotine and trains a squad of women to combat the 'Iron Umbrella' and a band of rebels.

programme.title: Love With the Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: Pauline Wong plays a pregnant student who marries a sympathetic, yet equally heartbroken, passer-by in Jamie Luk's directing debut.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: In this classic, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu take on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh, making this a 4-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: A woman gets involved in a Ching Dynasty salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and dilemmas gone rotten.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: A virtuous lone swordsman who is not without individual weaknesses (Ti Lung) finally decides that it's payback time.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: In this retelling of China's most popular romance, superstar Ivy Ling Po plays a scholar who tries to seduce a servant.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: A stunning snake goddess in human form seduces a young scholar before a Buddhist monk breaks up their union.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: The great martial clans of China seek to meet with the new Sun and Moon Sect leader and hatch a plan to resist invaders from the west.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Playfulness abounds and innocence is lost in this tale of two naughty females who grow up and discover boys together.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: When villains 'Winged Tiger' Teng Fei and 'Underworld King' Yin Te Lung unite, the martial arts world is plunged into chaos. Can this deadly duo be stopped?

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: In Shaw Brothers' showcase for the talented Ling Yun, a young drummer hungry for fame sacrifices everything including love, for his art. Will the prize prove worth the cost?

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Winner of 9 awards at the 32nd Hong Kong Film Awards! When a police van is hijacked, Deputy Commissioner M.B Lee launches a rescue operation codenamed Cold War.

programme.title: Perfect Imperfection
programme.desc: Starring Ady An, Ahn Jae Hyun & Alex Fong, this drama depicts the varying perspectives of love that drive two people born under the same horoscope sign - Virgo.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This incredible true story of real-life hero, Huo Yuan Jia, depicts how one man fights to balance the scales by taking on a list of ferocious opponents.

programme.title: I am Not Madame Bovary
programme.desc: Fan Bing Bing sacrificed her beauty to play an unattractive village woman and earned herself three Best Actress awards in this Feng Xiao Gang-helmed film that has won 14 international awards.

programme.title: Kung Fu Jungle
programme.desc: When a killer begins targeting top martial arts masters, Ha Hou Mo, a convicted criminal, is released from custody to stop him. Yet, will Ha keep his word?

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Eternal rivals Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are in a race to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the superstar midwife Gong San to "supervise" their sons and nephews to make it happen.

programme.title: Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: A legendary demon hunter tracks down beasts that enter the human dimension, assisted by a lawman protege and a motley crew of friendly monsters.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Soon after an important financial document is stolen from the computer of analyst Siu-yu, her boss receives an email demanding a relatively small ransom. Is this just the tip of an iceberg?

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Kara Hui makes her action film swansong by portraying a woman who will stop at nothing to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past resurface. Simon Yam & Wu Bai co-star.

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: Call of Heroes
programme.desc: Sean Lau, Louise Koo & Eddie Peng star in this action-packed story of a group of villagers who stand up to a cruel young warlord to protect their home.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: A popular author finds his life turned upside down after an attractive woman moves into the unit above his apartment. When she is found dead, things take an even more sinister turn.

programme.title: All About Ah Long
programme.desc: When Ah Long's ex-girlfriend resurfaces after a 10-year absence to take their son away from him, he must make a painful choice about what is best for the boy.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: The final chapter of Wong Jing's Colour Trilogy. Jordan Chan and Simon Yam bring you into the criminal underworld of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Never Said Goodbye
programme.desc: Zhou Dong Yu won 2016 MIMF Best Actress for her role in this romance in which a student fakes his own funeral to help the girl he loves deal with her grief.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The formative years of Wong Fei Hung see him defeat the Northern Sea's leader. Recognizing his talent, the Black Tiger's boss, Lei Gong, makes him his godson and one of his Four Tigers.

programme.title: All About Ah Long
programme.desc: When Ah Long's ex-girlfriend resurfaces after a 10-year absence to take their son away from him, he must make a painful choice about what is best for the boy.

programme.title: Extraordinary Mission
programme.desc: An undercover cop attempts to take down a drug trafficking syndicate from the inside. However, his operation spirals out of control when he becomes an addict while trying to gain the leader's trust.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: In order to meet his girlfriend's financial ultimatum, Siu Long decides to flip a penthouse. However, he ends up living with the other three investors when things go south.

programme.title: The Mafia Lady
programme.desc: A young cop, who vows revenge on his parents' murderer, discovers that one of the key assassins is his sister. How will this affect his vendetta?

programme.title: The Wedding Diary
programme.desc: A fisherman's son plans to marry the daughter of a rich developer. He promises a grand wedding but the cost is too high. He goes gambling and loses everything! Will the wedding go on?

programme.title: The Way Of The Dragon
programme.desc: This Bruce Lee classic depicts a clash between Chinese Kung Fu and Karate, and was filmed in Europe featuring two international Karate champions in its cast.

programme.title: Love off the Cuff
programme.desc: In this third instalment, can Cherie and Jimmy overcome their seven-year itch? The path to finding the answer is filled with laughter and tears.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman
programme.desc: There's no love lost between a plump manager & a charming lady but find themselves swapping bodies after getting struck by lightning.

programme.title: Seobok

programme.desc: Richard, along with Gas Monkey's own, Christie and Charles take the couch for a wild ride through 'crazy clip land'.

programme.title: Kindig Customs S2 Ep08
programme.desc: Muscle Car fans rejoice as not one but two classic '69 Camaros get the full Bitchin' Rides treatment.

programme.title: Texas Metal S4 Ep01
programme.desc: A long-time client wants to improve upon a near-perfect '68 Ford Ranger. The team is up to the task with an all-new custom chassis.

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks S1 Ep08
programme.desc: Martha gives a classic 1990 Surburban an update. An out-of-production Ford Excursion gets a Tommy-sized upgrade.

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars S9 Ep03
programme.desc: Wayne turns the collector car world on its ear when he makes the surprise announcement that he's selling the best barn find of his career.

programme.title: Garage Rehab S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Richard commits to rehabbing a 4x4 shop in New Caney, TX that has fallen on hard times.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S9 Ep15
programme.desc: The girls bring back the 442 Tribute car to do some of the finishing touches. They put together the interior, install the exhaust and finally get it back on the road.

programme.title: Fourwheeler S1 Ep08
programme.desc: An '80s Ramcharger is back in the shop for an engine swap. The owner wants a gas-powered Hemi, so Ian swaps the old, tired engine for one from a local junkyard.

programme.title: Roadkill S8 Ep02
programme.desc: David Freiburger and Mike Finnegan are back in the junkyard to take the front half of two separate four-wheel-drive vehicles and combine them into one.

programme.title: Fourwheeler S1 Ep03
programme.desc: The chassis on the Jeep JL has been powder coated, so now it's time for final assembly.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Joe Martin loves Novas. His eyes light up when a new customer, Eric, wants him to customize a 1972 as a tribute to his brother, if they can find one.

programme.title: Kindig Customs S2 Ep07
programme.desc: The newest member of the Kindig team is put to the test modifying the hood of a 2013 Mr. Norm's Challenger and Dave wants to make sure his newest employee is up to it.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S7 Ep01
programme.desc: Bogi finds an M-3 BMW she wants to buy for herself. After she reviews the car, there is plenty to fix.

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks S1 Ep07
programme.desc: JD discovers more problems than he bargains for when he buys an old fishing boat for a steal.

programme.title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
programme.desc: At a magical but remote island resort, lucky guests have their secret dreams realised. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the guests have to solve the island's mystery in order to escape.

programme.title: Atonement

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Someone (or something) has stolen the snacks for the spooky surprise party! It's up to Calvin and ROBO G to use their PLAY POWER to find them - if the mysterious 'Count Snackula' doesn't find them first.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep143
programme.desc: Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep144
programme.desc: Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa likes the swings but George doesn't because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide as it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.desc: A former arm-wrestling champion raised in the U.S. returns to South Korea for a tournament, but he finds his life complicated by the appearance of the biological family he never knew.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: Music teacher Sang-Jin was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation...

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: The Happy Life
programme.desc: Three middle-aged men, facing a personal crisis of their own, stumble into something that they have secretly missed -- a rock band.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: the Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: Like for Likes
programme.desc: An arrogant top star and a fussy screenwriter, a meddling chef and a homeless flight attendant, a deaf composer and TV drama producer. They learn to navigate the modern dating world via social media.

programme.title: Big Bang
programme.desc: After Park Man-su's wife asks for a divorce, the conservative salesman decides that he'll no longer play by the rules. Though a series of mishaps, Man-su becomes an unwitting fugitive from justice.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Sori: Voice From the Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Right before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: My Annoying Brother
programme.desc: An ex-con gets released from prison and re-enters his younger brother's life after he becomes blinded in an accident.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: The Big Swindle
programme.desc: Four con artists band together to perform a complex heist against the Bank of Korea, against the police, and against each other.

programme.title: Memoir of a Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins 'equally worse' fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: On Your Wedding Day
programme.desc: A bittersweet love story that chronicles a couple who met in high school and their relationship over the course of 10 years.

programme.title: Sunny
programme.desc: A group of girlfriends once inseparable in their teens reunite years later when they realize one of them is terminally ill.

programme.title: The Happy Life
programme.desc: Three middle-aged men, facing a personal crisis of their own, stumble into something that they have secretly missed -- a rock band.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Man of Will
programme.desc: In 1980s, a young scholar transforms into an independence fighter after being wrongly jailed.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
